author: Cortex XSOAR

classifier.description: Maps incoming Google Drive incident fields.
classifier.name: Google Drive - Incoming Mapper

incidentfield.description: The added parent object(s).
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Added Parents

incidentfield.description: True if this is the user making the request.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Assigned Current User

incidentfield.description: Indicates the object originated externally and was uploaded to Drive.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Uploaded

incidentfield.description: The sub-type of this event.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Assignment Subtype

incidentfield.description: A user whose account has since been deleted.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Assigned Deleted User

incidentfield.description: A Drive item which is a file.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Copied Item Is File

incidentfield.description: The removed parent object(s).
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Removed Parents

incidentfield.description: The target Drive item. The format is "items/ITEM_ID".
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Copied Item Name

incidentfield.description: The type of delete action taken.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Delete Type

incidentfield.description: Indicates the object was newly created (e.g. as a blank document), not derived from a Drive object or external object.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Created New

incidentfield.description: The set of permissions added by this change.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Added Permissions

incidentfield.description: The title of the shared drive.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Copied Shared Drive Title

incidentfield.description: The sub-type of this event.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Suggestion Subtype

incidentfield.description: The reference type corresponding to this event.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Reference Type

incidentfield.description: Users who are mentioned in this comment.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Mentioned Users

incidentfield.description: The new title of the drive object.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity New Title

incidentfield.description: The type of a Drive folder.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Copied Folder Type

incidentfield.description: The type of Data Leak Prevention (DLP) change.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity DLP Change Type

incidentfield.description: The user to whom the comment was assigned.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Assigned Person Name

incidentfield.description: The title of the Drive item.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Copied Item Title

incidentfield.description: The set of permissions removed by this change.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Removed Permissions

incidentfield.description: The sub-type of this event.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Post Subtype

incidentfield.description: The previous title of the drive object.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Old Title

incidentfield.description: The type of restore action taken.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Restore Type

incidentfield.description: The resource name of the shared drive.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Copied Shared Drive Name

incidentfield.description: The set of changes made to restrictions.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Restriction Changes

incidentfield.description: A user about whom nothing is currently known.
incidentfield.name: Google Drive Activity Assigned Unknown User

commands.description:
Creates a new Team Drive. The name argument specifies the name of the Team Drive. The specified user will be the first organizer.
This shared drive/team drive feature is available only with G Suite Enterprise, Enterprise for Education, G Suite Essentials, Business, Education, and Nonprofits edition.
commands.name: google-drive-drive-create

commands.description: Lists the changes for a user or shared drive.
commands.name: google-drive-changes-list

commands.description: Query past activity in Google Drive.
commands.name: google-drive-activity-list

commands.description: Permanently deletes a file owned by the user without moving it to the trash. If the file belongs to a shared drive the user must be an organizer on the parent. If the target is a folder, all descendants owned by the user are also deleted.
commands.name: google-drive-file-delete

commands.description: Lists a file's or shared drive's permissions.
commands.name: google-drive-file-permissions-list

commands.description: Creates a permission for a file or shared drive.
commands.name: google-drive-file-permission-create

commands.description: Updates a permission with patch semantics.
commands.name: google-drive-file-permission-update

commands.description: Make a copy of a Google Drive file.
commands.name: google-drive-file-copy

integration.description: Google Drive allows users to store files on their servers, synchronize files across devices, and share files. This integration helps you to create a new drive, query past activity, and view change logs performed by the users.
integration.name: Google Drive

description: Google Drive allows users to store files on their servers, synchronize files across devices, and share files. This integration helps you to create a new drive, query past activity and view change logs performed by the users, as well as list drives and files, and manage their permissions.
name: Google Drive
readme:
# Google Drive
This pack includes XSIAM content.

To configure the ingestion of data from Google Workspace, see the information [here](https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/cortex/cortex-xdr/cortex-xdr-pro-admin/external-data-ingestion/ingest-authentication-logs-and-data/ingest-logs-and-data-from-google-workspace).

* Pay attention: Timestamp parsing is available for UTC (+0000) timezone of the following formats:
  * %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ - UTC (+0000) format.
  * %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:E3SZ - UTC (+0000) format with 3 digits of fractional precision.
